# Kingtown King Park

The Kingtown King Park, also known as '''King's Residence''' (), is a residential skyscraper located in Gushan District, Kaohsiung, Taiwan. It was completed in 2016 and houses 118 apartment units. As of March 2025, it is the 10th tallest building in Kaohsiung. The height of the building is , and it comprises 36 floors above ground, as well as five basement levels.

* List of tallest buildings in Kaohsiung
